tasks.title: Port TradingView ATR Trailing Stop to Python
tasks.description: Find ATR Trailing Stop PineScript source using mcp_exa_web_search_exa. Convert to Python class in output/indicators/converted/atr_trailing_stop/. Include: atr_trailing_stop.py (class with calculate() and get_signal()), test_atr_trailing_stop.py (unit tests), README.md (usage docs).
